description: Try our easy to follow Potato & Red Capsicum Tortilla recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Potato & Red Capsicum Tortilla Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 160g chargrilled skinless red capsicum, rinsed drained & roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 19cm square cake pan with baking paper. Arrange 1/3 potato slices over base of pan, overlapping slightly. Top with half the capsicum, 2 tablespoons cheese and 1/3 of chives. Season with salt and pepper. Repeat layers, finishing with potato.
Whisk eggs and cream in a large jug. Pour over potatoes.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and chives.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Remove tortilla from pan and cut into 24 small squares.
Combine sour cream and spicy tomato sauce in a small bowl.
Serve tortilla with a dollop of spicy cream.
